remarks: Implicit substitution of 3 classes for 3 setvar variables.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Aug-1995.)
statement:
vtocl3ga.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
vtocl3ga.2 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
vtocl3ga.3 $e |- ( z = C -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
vtocl3ga.4 $e |- ( ( x e. D /\ y e. R /\ z e. S ) -> ph ) $.
vtocl3ga $p |- ( ( A e. D /\ B e. R /\ C e. S ) -> th ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B y z $.
$d C z $.
$d D x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d ch y $.
$d ps x $.
$d th z $.
